summary: Adds a unique item to give you easier access to your poisons and potions. The item can be found at the Shrine of Peryite.
descriptionHtml:
Readme - Cauldron of Peryite Standalone

This is a standalone version of an item I\'m adding to my other mod - Tactless Toxins

This is a simple mod adding a very simple item to the game. When this item
is in your inventory you gain a spell (used with the shout button)that opens
an inventory where you can place poisons and potions and from that inventory
you can shiftclick the poisons or potions and use them from there. The container
can only hold 3 units of weight, so if your poisons are standard weight it will
hold around 6 of them. The cauldron itself weighs .5 a unit and anything placed
inside won\'t weigh you down any.

The whole point of this is to make it easier to access your poisons and potions
and eventually I want to add another item that utilizes the inventory of this
one to make access even easier, but I don\'t know how to go about this at the
moment.

Technically this can hold any item that is under 3 units of weight, but I 
suggest only using poisons and potions.

Location:

The cauldron is found at the Shrine of Peryite in the reach, it isn\'t hard to
find so you should see it easily.

Installation:

unzip the files into your data directory, and make sure you get the meshes and
textures into the right place or the cauldron will look all weird. My recommendation
is to just click the nice green button for the download manager.

Conflicts:

There should be no conflicts, but if you have a potion reweight mod you will
be able to hold more items in your cauldron.
author: Magicfork
